title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting a field in the Type Hierarchy (TH) view, the 'Add Javadoc' option is available in the context menu, but selecting it does not produce any result.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the 'Add Javadoc' option is selected from the context menu of a field in the Type Hierarchy (TH) view, the action should add the Javadoc for the selected field.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Type Hierarchy (TH) view. 2. Select a field in the TH view. 3. Right-click on the selected field to open the context menu. 4. From the context menu, select 'Add Javadoc'.
